subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The 20-year-old Juan Martín del Potro of Argentina upset the top-ranked Rafael Nadal, 6-4, 3-6, 7-6 (3), Thursday in the quarterfinals at the Sony Ericsson Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
snippet: The 20-year-old Juan Martín del Potro of Argentina upset the top-ranked Rafael Nadal, 6-4, 3-6, 7-6 (3), Thursday in the quarterfinals at the Sony Ericsson Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
